column4: Hey guys, im still here, still working on an x1650 pro, does anyone wanna give me a hand in trying to make this work? Black screen, no logon, as I said before, when ckyle helped me, I could logon, but then I got a white screen
you can use the default vesa driver until your problem is resolved
i know, just letting you know that you can at least log in with that setting until you figure it out
